mapper.select: select book_id, book_name, book_publisher, book_writer, book_price, publication_date, book_sale, book_stock, book_grade, book_image, category_id from books order by book_id

select book_id, book_name, book_publisher, book_writer, book_price, publication_date, book_sale, book_stock, book_grade, book_image from books where publication_date >= #{date} - 7 order by publication_date desc

select * from ( select a.*,rownum rnum from( select a.book_id bookId,a.book_image bookImage,a.book_name bookName,b.book_writer bookWriter,b.book_grade bookGrade, count(*)book_amount, b.publication_date publicationDate,b.book_publisher bookPublisher from orders a,books b where a.book_id=b.book_id and to_char(order_date,'yyyymm') like to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') group by a.book_id,a.book_image,a.book_name,b.book_writer,b.book_grade, b.publication_date,b.book_publisher order by BOOK_AMOUNT desc)a)

select book_id, book_name, book_publisher, book_writer, book_price, publication_date, book_sale, book_stock, book_grade, book_image from books where book_sale / (sysdate-publication_date) >= 1 order by book_sale desc

select book_id, book_name, book_publisher, book_writer, book_price, publication_date, book_sale, book_stock, book_grade, book_image from books
where book_name like '%'||#{searchBook}||'%' or book_writer like '%'||#{searchBook}||'%' or book_publisher like '%'||#{searchBook}||'%' or publication_date like '%'||#{searchBook}||'%'
where book_name like '%'||#{searchBook}||'%'
where book_writer like '%'||#{searchBook}||'%'
where book_publisher like '%'||#{searchBook}||'%'
where publication_date like '%'||#{searchBook}||'%'
